mcq.statement: As per Article 53(1) of the Constitution of Pakistan 1973, after a general election the National Assembly shall _____ elect from amongst is members of Speaker and Deputy Speaker and so after the office of Speaker becomes vacant, the Assembly shall elect another member as Speaker, or as the case may be Deputy Speaker.

options.a: At its first meeting and to the exclusion of any other business
options.b: At its first meeting and after any other important business
options.c: At its first meeting and with the approval of the Prime Minister
